Detailed Description

This class implements a vector of two floats.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

float  b 
)

This constructor sets the elements of the vector to the input values.

Parameters:
a The value that element 0 is set to.
b The value that element 1 is set to.

INLINE Vector2::Vector2 ( const Vector2Base &  v2  )  [explicit]

This method constructs this Vector2 from Vector2Base.

If we are using DirectX, this is D3DXVECTOR2.

INLINE void Vector2::normalise (  ) 

This method normalises this vector.

That is, the direction of the vector will stay the same and its length will become 1.
